publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3199 Stuart McMillan: Housing Association Wins Gold Award for Safety at Workâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Oak Tree Housing Association, Inverclyde, which has recently received a Healthy Working Lives Award for safety at work; acknowledges that the housing association is the first in Scotland to receive such an award on the basis that it submitted a portfolio that was assessed to be of gold standard, and notes that the national award scheme supports employers and employees to develop health promotion and safety themes in the workplace. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Wilson*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3199 Housing Association Wins Gold Award for Safety at Work (lodged on 9 January 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, Angela Constance*
S3M-3199 Housing Association Wins Gold Award for Safety at Work (lodged on 9 January 2009) Ross Finnie*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3199 Housing Association Wins Gold Award for Safety at Work (lodged on 9 January 2009) Gil Paterson*
